title: Histogram Spread
question_text:
The nurse at an elementary school measured the heights (in inches) of $17\text{ subjects}$ and made the below histogram to display their heights.
Which of the following statements must be true?

I. The range is exactly $20\text{ inches}$.
II. The IQR is at least $12\text{ inches}$.
III. The standard deviation is about $8\text{ inches}$.

choices.text: None of the listed statements is correct.
